mods.abstract: DETAINED in the jail of the parish of St. John the Baptist the negro boy WILLIAMS aged about 40 years, meauring 5 feet 8 inches in height; he says he belongs to Mr. Johnson, of the parish of Plaquemine, and he speaks english and french. The owner is hereby duly notified to claim his property according to law. Parish of St John the Baptist, January 4th 1859. URSIN JACOB, Sheriff.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
